name: KnuckleBois
description:
Each player takes turns rolling dice and scoring points placed on their colour grid.

Players earn points by adding dice to their side, multiple of the same dice change the value per box to the amount of that dice. For example = two 4s in a row is 16 three 4s is 36.  

Players can remove dice from the other player's row by playing the same number in one of their active spaces on their row opposite that number.

There are special dice;

- 7 wipes out both your row and your opponents row

- 8 steals your opponents highest value and removes all of that value from their side

R to restart game
